title: Software Developer
points: Designed a rule-based content-matching framework for eInvoices, reducing country-specific implementation efforts by 70%.
Developed a pagination-based data retrieval algorithm that improved system efficiency by reducing SAP queries from 10,000 eInvoices per request to just 1.

title: Associate Software Developer
points: Led critical legal and feature updates for Document Compliance tax solutions from design to development.
Overhauled the error-handling capabilities of SAP DRC solution for Turkey, reducing customer incidents by 80% and improving customer satisfaction by 66%.

Spearheaded the integration of Data Protection and Privacy (DPP) protocols into the SAP Document Consistency solution, ensuring secure data handling and full compliance with global privacy regulations.
